Even something simple such as a chair massage,...
...when you go to a corporation and you're working on, say, accountants.
They've done studies with these accountants with just a ten-minute massage.
They tested them previous to the massage...
...and gave them a workout sheet of problems to answer...
...and then checked how many errors they had and how much they got done.
After a ten-minute massage, they were able to do twice as much work with half the errors.
And that's a research study that they did just with a ten-minute massage.
